title: G29 : Bed Leveling (Automatic)
content: “abl probes bed 3 points enables leveling compensation exact procedure method depends type chosen configuration.h auto_bed_leveling_3point matrix compensate tilt. auto_bed_leveling_linear also tilt grid applies "least-squares." auto_bed_leveling_bilinear produces mesh adjust across bed. ” printer must homed with g28 before g29. auto_bed_leveling_ubl see g29 ubl g26 editing. mesh_bed_leveling mbl page. “### automatic probing electronic probe marlin entire matter seconds every print single command available parameters depend style parameter descriptions examples below details. manual auto now includes probe_manually option systems lacking probe. adds q query state abort current to simply repeat until complete. the first accepts same shown usage section enabled note* not covered page unless coincide full list options. 1 get status isn’t idle . 2 m420 view data send s1 existing data. using gcode move point adjustment. piece paper just pass under nozzle. save value next point. 4 steps 3-4 completed. 5 m500 eeprom desired. lcd controller* requires lcd_bed_leveling select level sub-menu choose cancel. wait homing xyz click begin appears press controller button wheel 6 4-5 7 control store memory editing w write ignored during leveling. i index j x logical y z omitted raw z.
excerpt: Probe the bed and enable leveling compensation.

title: G29 : Bed Leveling (Manual)
content: “mesh bed leveling mbl allows interactively measuring height mesh without probe only tool required piece paper feeler gauge compensate variations across bed. host 1 g29 s0 get current status ’s existing send m420 s1 . 2 move first point adjustment. 3 adjust just pass under nozzle. 4 s2 save value next point. 5 repeat steps 3-4 until completed. 6 m500 eeprom desired. using lcd controller requires lcd_bed_leveling select level choose not cancel sub-menu. wait homing xyz complete. click begin appears press button wheel 4-5 7 control store memory ”
excerpt: Measure Z heights in a grid, enable leveling compensation
